title: Halloween cupcakes two ways
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '200g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '50g white chocolate, grated', '60g white chocolate, chopped', '120g caster sugar', '1 egg', '200ml milk', '60g butter, melted', 'To ice and decorate', '30g icing sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '50g cream cheese, at room temperature', 'chocolate syrup', 'red and orange food colouring', 'green liquorice comfits']
